description: Peanut Havored Mussamun curry paste in cream of coconut with white potato, sweet potato and onion topped with cashew nut
Thai yellow curry cooked in cream of coconut with potato, sweet potato, pineapple and onion.
Sweet & Spicy green curry paste in cream of coconut with sweet basil, bamboo shoot, zucchini, green pea, snow pea, baby corn and eggplant.
Grilled salmon topped with Panang curry sauce with baby corn, carrot, zucchini, snow pea, and broccoli.
Filet snapper deep-fried topped with special three-season sauce with vegetables.
Calamari stir-fried in delicious garlic n pepper sauce with broccoli, carrot, zucchini, onion, snow pea, baby corn, and cilantro.
Classic stir-fried rice noodle with egg, green onion, bean sprout and side of crush peanut and lime in special Pad Thai sauce.
